document.masterDocTitle: A recent inventory of the bats of Mozambique with documentation of seven new species for the country

subSubSection.paragraph: Three individuals were recorded at a single site in northern Mozambique . Previously, this species was only known from Chiutu, central Mozambique ( Smithers and Lobão Tello, 1976 ).
Field measurements: FA (adult male) 35.9 (1); Bm (adult male) 7.0 (1); FA (adult female) 36.2 (35.5–37.6, 2); Bm (adult female) 7.0 (6.0–8.0, 2).
